name: roar
flavor_text: The target is scared off, and a different Pokémon is dragged out. In the wild, this ends a battle against a single Pokémon.
effect_text_extend:
Switches the target out for another of its trainer's Pokémon selected at random.  Wild battles end immediately.

Doesn't affect Pokémon with suction cups or under the effect of ingrain.
effect_text_simple: Immediately ends wild battles.  Forces trainers to switch Pokémon.
